Reviews.Title: IMMEDIATE CONTACT WITH CUSTOMER, EVEN BEFORE TV DELIVERY!
Reviews.Author: Dennis Renfro
Reviews.Content: This CANOPY 5-YEAR PROTECTION PLAN is being rated before having to avail myself of any covered services that the plan provides. I was immediately (next day after purchase) contacted by CANOPY. The representative clearly described all of the plan's many coverages. She answered several questions I needed to undertand about how to use that plan. This was a $2K plasma TV purchase, and I felt that the full FIVE YEAR coverage was worth the money. I normally do not buy extended coverage plans. But five years is a long time, and I've never owned a plasma TV. So, the "peace of mind" is worth what I paid. And, I hopefully won't ever need to use it. But, the plan covers lots of issues NOT covered by the competition, and for a longer time. READ THE FINE PRINT CAREFULLY BEFORE YOU BUY ANY PLAN. Some companies just give you a secure feeling. CANOPY does that for me!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Vsh
Reviews.Content: I haven't needed to use this product yet, so there's not much that I can say about it from experience claiming an item.  However, I called their customer service beforehand, and they were both knowledgeable and very professional.  More to the point, they confirmed that there is no limit on the amount of money that they will spend on repairing your TV - a policy not frequently found in their competitors!  I am very happy knowing that no matter how many times my TV requires a several-hundred dollar repair, Canopy will always be there for me.

Reviews.Title: Canopy protection plan
Reviews.Author: Big Bob M
Reviews.Content: The service (customer contact) was very quick and reassuring. I feel that I have made a good choice for protecting my 3D flat screen TV.

Reviews.Title: Great plan on paper
Reviews.Author: S. Martinez
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my Samsung UN60ES7500. I really hope that I never have to use the service, but having the service for 5 years is great peace of mind.  The last two flat screens I purchased have experienced problems, so it's better to be safe than sorry. If I have an issue that requires using the Canopy Protection Plan, I will be sure to update my rating.
